text: A vaccine that has to be stored at -70° C, what could possibly go wrong? It's not even cold enough in Scotland during a #thundersnow storm! When your immune system is 99.9% effective, better not to take the chance, what do you think? https://t.co/uZ7pkkuKVY #vaccine #covid19 https://t.co/tHOHADEEia https://t.co/zGNm8Fg1rC
